timelineItems.text: #WorldCup Colombia already making life tricky for the Uruguayans.

timelineItems.name: Kevin Jones
timelineItems.text: Just saw one of the suckiest jobs ever, sitting in an orange and yellow coat at the #WorldCup with your back to the game

timelineItems.name: The Football Tards!!

timelineItems.name: Alex Lowe
timelineItems.text: Good to see Uruguay already just trying to kick Colombia out of the game #COLvsURU #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Abel Aguilar (Colombia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Maxi Pereira (Uruguay).

timelineItems.name: Anita DeCianni-Brown
timelineItems.text: Uruguay ~ have you not learned from previous foolishness? #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Danyal Effendi
timelineItems.text: James Rodriguez of Colombia scores his team's first goal Watch live http://t.co/gqEXU1ROId #Brazil2014 http://t.co/kxppz4Z6cS

timelineItems.name: Danyal Effendi
timelineItems.text: James Rodriguez of Colombia scores his team's first goal Watch live http://t.co/gqEXU1ROId #Brazil2014 http://t.co/kxppz4Z6cS

timelineItems.name: Jake Hopkins
timelineItems.text: Colombia will be the underdog in every game they play from here on out! I'm pumped! #Colombia #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Akhilesh Sharma
timelineItems.text: #COL | 11 Goals in the #WorldCup so far. James Rodriguez | 5 goals in 4 matches. Juan Cuadrado | 4 assists in 4 matches. #WOW #COLvsURU

timelineItems.comment: Diego Godín (Uruguay) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Fredy Guarín (Colombia).
Attempt saved. Edinson Cavani (Uruguay) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Abel Hernández.
Corner,  Uruguay. Conceded by David Ospina.

timelineItems.name: كاس العالم 2014
timelineItems.text: #WorldCup #brazilol فرحة جمهور #كولومبيا http://t.co/eT9K4RUaHr.

timelineItems.name: كاس العالم 2014
timelineItems.text: #WorldCup #brazilol فرحة جمهور #كولومبيا http://t.co/eT9K4RUaHr.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Diego Godín (Uruguay) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Gastón Ramírez with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Quinn
timelineItems.text: Has Ospina done anything wrong this whole tournament? #sensational #COLURU #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Jeff Williford
timelineItems.text: How scary would Columbia be if Falcao was able to play? Sheesh. #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Edinson Cavani (Uruguay) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Alexander Mejía (Colombia).

timelineItems.name: shrimant katari
timelineItems.text: It is gonna be Brazil vs Colombia and Neymar vs James Rodriguez! It is going to be a good encounter! #JamesRodriguez #special #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Adrián Ramos (Colombia).
Maxi Pereira (Uruguay) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Adrián Ramos (Colombia).

timelineItems.name: v22
timelineItems.text: #lfc #suarez #suarez is the chant from thousands of supporters even #columbian supporters join in. #english blind to #injustice #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Egidio Arévalo Rios (Uruguay) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Abel Aguilar (Colombia).

timelineItems.name: George Thorpe
timelineItems.text: I'm very impressed by Ospina in the #COL goal. Very alert despite lack of action overall and pulling off good saves #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Tony Xypteras
timelineItems.text: It was a good run, Forlan. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Edwin Bear
timelineItems.text: Well #URU is done. That bites. #COLvsURU #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Edinson Cavani (Uruguay).
Juan Zuñiga (Colombia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Student Soccer Blog
timelineItems.text: #COLvsURU While we praise #JamesRodriguez. Give a thought to #JuanCuadrado! 1st player to provide four assists in a #WorldCup since 2006!

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Diego Godín (Uruguay).
Jackson Martínez (Colombia) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: CL01
timelineItems.text: Colombia takes a bite out of Uruguay #WorldCup2014 #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Guillermo Herrera
timelineItems.text: #uruguay goes home! #Colombia played unbelievable! #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Colombia 2, Uruguay 0.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
